sections.heading: numbers.The mayor and city council of a city of the first class may provide for regulating and requiring the numbering of houses along public streets or avenues

sections.text:
16-614.House numbers.

The mayor and city council of a city of the first class may provide for regulating and requiring the numbering of houses along public streets or avenues.

SourceLaws 1901, c. 18, § 50, p. 268;R.S.1913, § 4913;C.S.1922, § 4081;C.S.1929, § 16-610;R.S.1943, § 16-614;Laws 2019, LB194, § 35.
